Confederation of Labor and its engineering workers' arm said they considered the agreements an attack on labor rights.`` We'll assess whether to appeal to the judiciary,'' said confederation officer Susanna Camusso said. A clause that stops a worker from taking part in a strike is an issue that would certainly go as far as the Constitutional Court as we are talking about rights that are not at the disposal of a company or of a union.
